forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 53. West southwest wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds under a canopy of clear, sunny skies, a welcome contrast to the fog that often blankets the city. With temperatures gently climbing to around 70 degrees and a modest breeze whispering from the west, the air is fresh and invigorating. Currently, the visibility is excellent; the iconic outlines of the Golden Gate Bridge can be admired without the interference of the marine layer that frequently lingers over the bay. 

As Saturday progresses, the warmth will subtly dip, settling into a comfortable 68 degrees by the afternoon, making it an ideal time for a leisurely stroll or a quiet afternoon at a café. Dressing in light layers will serve well against the coolening winds—perhaps a light sweater or cardigan for the later part of the day. For those seeking an afternoon escape, a walk along the Embarcadero offers a blend of urban energy and tranquil bay views, an experience enhanced by the brilliant clarity of the day.
